title: Product Row Schema
description: Defines the structure for a single product row read from the source Google Sheet.

sku.description: Stock Keeping Unit. Unique identifier for the product.

product_name.description: The official name of the product.

price.description: Price of the product. Can be a number or a string like 'Contact us'.

description.description: A short, user-facing description of the product.

image_url.description: A publicly accessible URL for the product's primary image.

is_active.description: A boolean (TRUE/FALSE in the sheet) indicating if the product is active.
